description: This table contains service line information from the remittance image.

columns.name: IMAGE_ID
columns.description: This is the ID for the remittance image record with remittance service line information.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number in the results of a query.  Each instance of service line information will have its own line.

columns.name: SERVICE_LINE
columns.description: Service line information for claim remittance.

columns.name: PROC_IDENTIFIER
columns.description: The composite medical procedure identifier to identify a medical procedure by its standardized codes for service line information.

columns.name: LINE_ITEM_CHG_AMT
columns.description: Monetary amount for submitted service line item charge.

columns.name: PROV_PAYMENT_AMT
columns.description: Monetary amount for the service line item provider payment amount.

columns.name: NUBC_REV_CD
columns.description: National uniform billing committee revenue code for service line information.

columns.name: UNITS_PAID_CNT
columns.description: Count of the Units of Service Paid for service line information.

columns.name: SUBM_PROC_IDENT
columns.description: Submitted composite medical procedure identifier information if that was different from adjudicated procedure for service line information.

columns.name: ORIG_UNITS_CNT
columns.description: Original units of service count for service line information.

columns.name: SVC_LINE_CHG_PB_ID
columns.description: ID for professional billing service line charge.

columns.name: SVC_LINE_CHG_HB_ID
columns.description: ID for hospital billing service line charge.
